General.Name: KPX Lifescience.Co.Ltd
General.Description: KPX Lifescience.Co.,Ltd. engages in development, production, and sale of agrochemical raw materials and pharmaceutical intermediates in South Korea and internationally. The company offers raw materials for pharmaceuticals, pesticides, and primary intermediates to the pharmaceutical and agrochemical markets. It also develops EDP-CL, an intermediate for piperacillin-based antibiotics, including N,N-disuccinimidyl carbonate used for the synthesis of HIV treatment; Amoxapine, an antidepressant raw material; and AM19, an antibiotic intermediate. The company was formerly known as MNH Laboratories Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KPX Lifescience.Co.,Ltd. in September 2008. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Yeosu, South Korea. KPX Lifescience.Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of KPX Holdings Co., Ltd.
